answerText: ddNTPs [or dideoxynucleotides][10] The length of a DNA sequence is usually measured in these. The K-12 E. Coli genome is about 4.6 million of these and there are about 10.5 of these per helical turn of DNA.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | MIT A  | 13 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question: They are used in chain-termination methods of DNA sequencing, since once they are added to a DNA chain, elongation can no longer occur. For 10 points each: [10] Name these nucleotides lacking a hydroxyl group at both their 2' and 3' carbons.
